DataElement.preferredName: Anal Endoscopy Diagnostic Procedure Physical Examination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not an assessment or evaluation to diagnose disease through an anal endoscopic examination was performed

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Anal Endoscopy Diagnostic Procedure Physical Examination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the diagnostic assessment or evaluation to diagnose disease through an anal (having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel) endoscopic examination (the use of a thin, lighted tube, called an endoscope, to examine inside the body).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel.:(en-DAHS-ko-pee) The use of a thin, lighted tube (called an endoscope) to examine the inside of the body.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Having to do with the anus, which is the posterior opening of the large bowel.
A diagnostic or therapeutic procedure in which an endoscope is inserted in a tubular organ to examine the structural architecture and/or remove abnormal tissues.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
